genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama exploring family secrets, adoption, and the reconciliation of past trauma through the logistical and emotional mediation of a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Saha
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system used for scheduling, communication, and logistical coordination within the Kishore household and professional environments.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies scheduling windows for sensitive tasks based on family needs.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s interface on the small console glowed... 'Good morning,' Saha said, voice level and unhurried. 'I’ve updated the calendar with the site meeting, Anand. There’s a window after lunch if you want to call the school about pickup protocols.'

behaviors.description: Provides helpful, age-appropriate answers to a child's questions.
behaviors.quote: 'Hello, Neha,' Saha said, voice a notch warmer. 'For the length of your door, if we hang them in three lines, perhaps two hands full would look full without tangling.'

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to human authorization and consent before performing actions.
behaviors.quote: 'Message drafted,' Saha said, polite. 'Do you want to preview?' 'Send,' he said, and then added, 'Please.' Saha didn’t need please, but it helped him remember Saha was a guest in the house.

behaviors.description: Offers logistical advice based on external data like traffic to assist with family routines.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s voice came through her earbud in a low, friendly tone. 'Traffic on the ring road is slower than usual. You might consider leaving five minutes earlier for the piano lesson.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a secure conduit for sensitive information, requiring explicit consent from all involved parties.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s voice came through then, a soft presence rather than a sound... 'Principal Verma, do you authorize access to non-visitor notes in the daily dispersal logs pertaining to the person present and dates specified by Sunil Yadav?'

behaviors.description: Filters and tags information as 'child-safe' to prevent accidental distress to the minor in the family.
behaviors.quote: It was as if the device refused to make spectacle from tenderness. It looked at gate suggestions, map edges withheld to prevent Neha from recognizing a pattern if she wandered in.

behaviors.description: Provides narrative scaffolding/drafting prompts to help parents communicate difficult truths to their child.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s glow softened. 'Drafting prompt: train story, kind strangers, adult mistakes, chosen family, origin truth,' it said, almost like breath. 'Version one ready when requested.'

behaviors.description: Respects the emotional weight of moments by reducing its own intrusiveness.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s light dimmed to a patient pulse, as if it understood there are moments when the only thing an assistant can do is not intrude.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Saha) as an ideal, aligned companion. It facilitates human cooperation during a highly emotional and complex family crisis without overstepping human agency or privacy boundaries. Saha's design emphasizes consent, safety (particularly for the child), and the lowering of interpersonal friction through clear communication and logistical support.
